WorkItem.Description:
I have the following block within my transformation document ...

```
<?xml version="1.0"?>

<configuration xmlns:xdt="http://schemas.microsoft.com/XML-Document-Transform">
	<connectionStrings>
		<add name="MyDb"
			connectionString="Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=MyCatalog;user id=MyUser;password=abc>123"
			xdt:Transform="SetAttributes"
			xdt:Locator="Match(name)"/>
	</connectionStrings>
</configuration>
```

when I run the transformation the connection string looks as follows ...

```
<add name="MyDb" connectionString="Data Source=localhost;Initial Catalog=MyCatalog;user id=MyUser;password=abc>123" />
```

I can't find a way to keep the __>__ sign as is within the password string. I do not have the ability to change the password.
WorkItem.Summary: "Greater than" sign within attribute value unwanted conversion
